page.title: 06C.O. at R.A.F. COLTISHALL
page.content: Group Captain M.R. French R.A.F came to Coltishall in February 1985 after a posting at M.O.D. London. He has served in the R.A.F. for 27 years. As C.O. he has the responsibility for 1300 airmen and airwomen under his command. Also the responsibility for 1300 wives and children. Because he has total responsibilty for the whole station his day consisits of many duties; e.g. forward planning, disciplining the service personel, flying, checks on the safety of flying, various inspections such as the feeding and billeting of the personel and entertaining the various visitors to the station. In his free time he enjoys golf, gardening, bridge and reading. He feels that the station can be of benefit to the local community especially in cases of emergency.
